name: It's A Beautiful World
description: It's A Beautiful World is a short visual novel that takes place in a post apocalyptic world where the world that we know today is no longer the same and androids have ruled over. The story follows the character Leon, a man in his late 40's. A lone survivor who roams around this empty world trying to forget his dark past. Everything changes when Leon comes across a girl who is an android, alone in an empty run down museum. You then follow the story of them wandering around this empty yet beautiful world.
